name: Mitt Romney
summary: Former Republican presidential nominee and U.S. Senator who became Trump's most prominent GOP critic in Congress, voting to convict him in both impeachment trials.

keyStatements.quote: He is not fit for office. He should not be president again. He's not only unfit for office, but I can't imagine that the American people would elect him for re-election.

I believe that the president's conduct was wrong and egregious. The president asked a foreign government to investigate his political rival. The president withheld vital military funds from that government to press it to do so.
keyStatements.context: Voting to convict Trump in first impeachment

keyStatements.quote: A great party has lost its way.
keyStatements.context: On the state of the Republican Party under Trump
